amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to provide $5,000,000 for the operation of the control center that monitors traffic in Houston, Texas, known as "Houston TransStar".

action.text: Mr. Rogers (KY) raised a point of order against the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A004). Mr. Rogers of Kentucky stated that the Jackson-Lee amendment sought to provide appropriation for a project not authorized and as such, was out of order. The Chair sustained the point of order.
